UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel Antimicrobial Peptides EeCentrocins 1, 2 and EeStrongylocin 2 from the Edible Sea Urchin Echinus esculentus Have 6-Br-Trp Post-Translational Modifications.
Literature.Author: Solstad RG, Li C, Isaksson J, Johansen J, Svenson J, Stensvag K, Haug T

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:12% Hemolysis=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:19% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:56% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=6.25µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC=0.78µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 9144(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis 5179-R1(MIC=3.13µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=3.13µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.56µM),Escherichia coli MC4100 NR698(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.78µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=6.25µM),Aureobasidium pullulans(MIC=25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=50µM),Cladosporium sp.(MIC=12.5µM),Rhodotorula sp.(MIC=3.13µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=12.5µM)
